snippet: One of the regulars during Luc Carl’s bartending days on the Lower East Side was Stefani Germanotta, a k a Lady Gaga, with whom he had a six-year, tempestuous romance.
abstract: Luc Carl, former bartender at the Lower East Side rock bar St Jerome's and a long-term boyfriend of Stefani Germanotta before she became known as Lady Gaga, has a new memoir out chronicling his fitness makeover entitled The Drunk Diet.
lead_paragraph: One of the regulars during Luc Carl’s bartending days on the Lower East Side was Stefani Germanotta, a k a Lady Gaga, with whom he had a six-year, tempestuous romance.

headline.seo: Rocking on His Own, Lady Gaga’s Ex
headline.main: Lady Gaga’s Muse Tests His Poker Face
headline.print_headline: Lady Gaga’s Muse Tests His Poker Face
